title: Percentage of e-commerce in total U.S. Q4 retail sales 2010 to 2019
yAxis: Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales
summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales in the y axis.
The Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '10.
Quarter Q4 '19 has 2.5 times more Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales than Quarter Q4 '10 which is has the lowest.
